title: A Wild Wildcard Weekend, Bears Unbalanced, Luck for MVP and Tired of Texans
itunes:title: A Wild Wildcard Weekend, Bears Unbalanced, Luck for MVP and Tired of Texans
description:
Colin discusses NFL Wild Card weekend, why the Chicago Bears aren't ready, why Indianapolis Colts QB Andrew Luck is his MVP, and why he's sick of the Houston Texans. Guests include DeAngelo Hall, Shawne Merriman, Trent Dilfer, and Jay Glazer.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
